positive_examples: This is an example of fashion designing.
The fashion designing demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed fashion designing in this context.
A typical case of fashion designing would involve these features.
The concept of fashion designing applies here.
The process of creating clothing, accessories, and other wearable items by conceptualizing styles, patterns, and materials.
negative_examples: This is an example of graphic designing, not fashion designing.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: GraphicDesigning, or other types of Designing

definition: The creative process of conceiving and producing clothing and accessories.
